author: Staff Reporter
text:
Indian Community Welfare Organisation (ICWO), an NGO, will organise Clean Chennai Campaign at Velankadu Crematorium in Anna Nagar on February 20. The NGO invites volunteers to join their effort in cleaning up the facility maintained by Chennai Corporation.

The crematorium was earlier cleaned by the students of Madras School of Social Work, Stella Maris College, Margregorios College, Madras Christian College and Liverpool Hope University, UK.

Contact details

Volunteers can call Praveena Solomon, caretaker, Velankadu crematorium on 9841519982, says a press note issued by ICWO.
title: NGO seeks volunteers’ support to clean crematorium
